metadata.title: CVE-2018-16427 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Various out of bounds reads when handling responses in OpenSC before0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards topotentially crash the opensc library using programs.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
